result.eng: We will be hugely thankful to you.
result.ga: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díot
result.orig: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díot
result.html: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díotWe will be hugely thankful to you.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ṫar a ḃeiṫ buíoċ díotWe will be hugely thankful to you.

result.eng: I am grateful to you for it.
result.ga: Tá mé buíoch díot as sin
result.orig: Tá mé buíoch díot as sin
result.html: Tá mé buíoch díot as sinI am grateful to you for it.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé buíoċ díot as sinI am grateful to you for it.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ga: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.orig: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.html: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ponchtml: Ba dona an ṁaise dúinn gan a ḃeiṫ buíoċ deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.
